column1: #Text=George Bush and Irish Prime Minister attend reception at White House to commemorate St. Patrick 's day
#Text=Bertie Ahern , the Prime Minister of Ireland visited the White House Monday to commemorate St. Patrick 's Day .
#Text=Mr. Ahern makes this visit annually , for what he calls a " very substantial and useful meeting . "

#Text=Mr. Ahern started his speech by saying " Mr. President and Mrs. Bush , thank you for the welcome and honor which you 've extended to our delegation , and to all the Irish guests , from North and from South , who are here at the White House this morning to mark St. Patrick 's Day , Ireland 's National Day .
